attributes.action: Reduce the length of time required to claim unfair dismissal
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, believe that the length of time required to claim unfair dismissal against an employer (currently requires you to have worked at your employer for 2 years or more) needs to be reduced immediately.

People may feel secure in their job if they've worked there for months, but not years; and yet they could lose their job in a heartbeat without any reason.

We want the government to lower the time requirement to claim unfair dismissal to 3 months. After working a job for 3-6 months, a person should be able to feel secure in their job, rather than worrying every day about their job security!
